statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -3 \\ -3 \\ 1 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ 0 \\ -5 \\ 2 \\ 5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ -3 \\ -4 \\ -3 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -15 \\ 3 \\ 11 \\ -13 \\ -20 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent or linearly independent.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -3 \\ -3 \\ 1 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ 0 \\ -5 \\ 2 \\ 5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ -3 \\ -4 \\ -3 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -15 \\ 3 \\ 11 \\ -13 \\ -20 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent .
